title: Wrongful Dismissal - Sarah Chen vs TechCorp Solutions
summary: Employee alleges unfair dismissal after reporting safety violations. Claims victimisation and seeks reinstatement plus compensation. Company claims dismissal was due to performance issues and budget cuts.

title: Breach of Software Licence Agreement - DataFlow Ltd vs CloudTech
summary: Software vendor alleges client exceeded licence terms by deploying software on unauthorised servers. Seeking damages of £194,400 and injunctive relief. Client claims licence terms were ambiguous.

title: Outstanding Invoice Collection - Premier Consulting vs StartupXYZ
summary: Consulting firm seeks collection of £35,000 in unpaid invoices for strategic planning services. Client disputes quality of work and claims breach of service agreement.

title: Age Discrimination and Hostile Work Environment - James Wilson vs MegaCorp
summary: Employee claims age discrimination and hostile work environment after being passed over for promotion multiple times. Alleges younger, less qualified candidates were promoted instead.

title: Restrictive Covenant Breach - InnovateTech vs Former Employee
summary: Technology company seeks injunction against former senior developer who joined competitor within restricted period. Claims breach of restrictive covenant and theft of trade secrets.

title: Medical Services Payment Dispute - HealthFirst vs Insurance Co
summary: Medical practice seeks payment of £60,500 in denied insurance claims. Insurance company claims services were not medically necessary and outside policy coverage.
